alert.note: Alert for Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:03PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Holt and northeastern Wheeler Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 103 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Chambers, or 26 miles south of O`Neill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Buffalo Flats, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Cumminsville and Four Corners. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 148 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
